 1  """ 
 2  Support for creating videos. 
 3  """

21  import numpy as np 
22  from imusim.visualisation.rendering import AnimatedRenderer 
23  try: 
24      from mayavi import mlab 
25  except ImportError: 
26      from enthought.mayavi import mlab 
27  import tempfile 
28  import os 
29  import subprocess 
30  import shutil 
31  import collections 
32   

33 -def createVideo(filename, renderers, tMin, tMax, framerate=25, 
34          resolution=None): 

35      """ 
36      Create a video of a 3D visualisation. 
37   
38      The video is created using the current MayaVi figure, which should be setup 
39      beforehand to correctly position the camera and any other elements that 
40      should be rendered. 
41   
42      @param filename: Name of the video file to create. 
43      @param renderers: List of L{AnimatedRenderer} objects to use. 
44      @param tMin: Time from which to begin rendering. 
45      @param tMax: Time at which to stop rendering. 
46      @param framerate: Framerate of the video in frames per second. 
47      @param resolution: Resolution of the video (width, height). If not 
48          specified, the resolution of the current figure is used. 
49      """ 
50      if not isinstance(renderers, collections.Iterable): 
51          renderers = [renderers] 
52   
53      figure = mlab.gcf() 
54      if resolution is not None: 
55          originalResolution = figure.scene.get_size() 
56          figure.scene.set_size(resolution) 
57      figure.scene.off_screen_rendering = True 
58      figure.scene.disable_render = True 
59   
60      frameTimes = np.arange(tMin, tMax, 1.0/framerate) 
61   
62      try: 
63          imageDir = tempfile.mkdtemp() 
64          for f,t in enumerate(frameTimes): 
65              for r in renderers: 
66                  r.renderUpdate(t) 
67              framefile = os.path.join(imageDir, '%06d.png'%(f)) 
68              mlab.savefig(framefile, size=resolution) 
69              assert os.path.exists(framefile) 
70   
71          retval = subprocess.call(['ffmpeg', '-f','image2', '-r', str(framerate), 
72                  '-i', '%s'%os.path.join(imageDir,'%06d.png'), '-sameq', 
73                  filename, '-pass','2']) 
74      finally: 
75          shutil.rmtree(imageDir) 
76          figure.scene.disable_render = False 
77          figure.scene.off_screen_rendering = False 
78          if resolution is not None: 
79              figure.scene.set_size(originalResolution)
